General.Name: Xinhuanet Co Ltd
General.Description: Xinhuanet Co., Ltd. operates a news information service portal in China. The company publishes news from 31 local channels; and from English, French, Spanish, Russian, Arabic, Japanese, Korean, German, Portuguese, Cyrillic, Mongolian and other foreign language websites and clients. It also provides online advertising and information services; multimedia information services, big data intelligent analysis services, and large-scale forums and conferences; network technology services, such as website construction, content management, operation and maintenance, and technical services; digital content; and mobile internet services. The company was founded in 2000 and is headquartered in Beijing, China. Xinhuanet Co., Ltd. is a subsidiary of Xinhua News Agency.
